item.description:
I hope you had a great summer and am happy to announce another great year of Friday night workshops and discussions with Herb Pearce. Herb is a great teacher and also encourages deep and meaningful conversation. There are many events to choose from on a Friday night. The ones led by Herb will be the most intense and real. The topic this week will be about reducing suffering. Here is a description from Herb:

”Women and men suffer more than necessary. We base our happiness on the up and down nature of relationships, work, money and health. Learn to live with the awareness of your deeper nature beyond pain and temporary happiness. Learn practical tips of self-observation, expansive awareness, living in the moment, gratitude, and living beyond the ego. Live in a state of more permanent happiness beyond the conditions of life.”

The suggested minimum cost of attending the workshop is $15.00. A sliding scale of any amount is allowed if the cost would otherwise prevent you from coming. The traditional cost of this workshop has been $40.00 so if you can afford more than $15.00, it helps the presenter and those who pay less.

Refreshments will be served. We are also welcomed to bring or share our own food as long as it is vegetarian.
item.name: No More Suffering
